function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of spatial organization in the home may lead to increased risk of disease transmission between different activities and areas within the home.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contagion and spread of contagious diseases within the household.","Mitigation":"Implementing adaptable and modular spatial organization to create distinct zones for different activities and functions within the home.","Technologies":"Modular furniture, adaptable partitions, smart home technology for spatial management.","People":"Household occupants.","Owner":"Homeowners, interior designers, architects."},{"Description":"Inadequate handling and delivery system for goods and services may lead to potential exposure to contaminants during the transfer of items into the home.","Impact":"Risk of contamination and spread of diseases through goods and services brought into the home.","Mitigation":"Installing a secure handling area with a delivery hatch for contactless transfer of goods and services.","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, secure delivery hatches, disinfection chambers for incoming items.","People":"Household occupants, delivery personnel, service providers.","Owner":"Homeowners, property managers, delivery companies."},{"Description":"Limited space and lack of dedicated entry zones for managing outdoor to indoor transitions may lead to an increased risk of bringing contaminants into the home.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of outdoor contaminants being tracked into the home, contributing to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Creating designated pre-entry zones and post-entry zones with facilities for removing outdoor footwear and clothing.","Technologies":"Shoe removal benches, outdoor shoe storage, air purification systems for entryways.","People":"Household occupants, visitors.","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, property developers."}]}
